articles.title: Actors Hong Ling and Nick Teo officially engaged in surprise sunset yacht proposal - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Happily ever after, sailing off into the sunset – the story of the celebrity couple's official engagement ends well, but initially involved threatening weather, an angry bride-to-be and a cake that never got eaten.
articles.content:
After seven years of dating, Singaporean actors Hong Ling and Nick Teo are officially engaged. Teo, 31, proposed on Tuesday (Aug 16), which was also Hongs 28th birthday, on board a yacht at sunset.
